definition: all black, no daylight (idiom); a world without justice
(negative prefix)/not/no
to appear/also written 現|现[xian4]
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
day/sky/heaven
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
sun/day/date, day of the month

sentences.english: I haven't been in the sun for days.
sentences.chinese: 我已經好幾天不見天日了。

sentences.english: They were covered up and never retrieved.
sentences.chinese: 他們被埋起來永不見天日。

sentences.english: I have walked through the tunnel but I still can't see the light.
sentences.chinese: 我走過隧道，但我仍然可以不見天日。

sentences.english: For three days the sun did not break through the volcanic ash that filled the sky.
sentences.chinese: 火山灰瀰漫了整個天際，整整三天不見天日。
